section_title: AMENDMENT TO THE PROTOCOL RELATING TO COMPLIANCE
sentences: This issue relates to a proposal by Saudi Arabia at COP/MOP 1 to amend the Protocol to entail legally binding consequences for non-compliance.
It was briefly taken up by the SBI plenary on 2 December and SBI Chair Asadi said he would consult informally.

On 10 December, the SBI closing plenary agreed to continue consideration of the issue at SBI 30 without adopting formal conclusions and the COP/MOP closing plenary took note of this action on 12 December.
